alert.note: Alert for Butler; Clermont; Hamilton (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 12:12AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...GUSTY WINDS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF OHIO, EAST CENTRAL RIPLEY, DEARBORN, NORTHEASTERN SWITZERLAND, KENTON, CAMPBELL, BOONE, EASTERN GALLATIN, HAMILTON, SOUTH CENTRAL BUTLER AND NORTHWESTERN CLERMONT COUNTIES THROUGH 1245 AM EDT... At 1210 AM EDT, gusty winds were located along a line extending from near Fairfield to near Cleves to Moores Hill, moving southeast at 45 mph. Wind gusts will be out in front of the main line of storms. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 35 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cincinnati, Hamilton, Fairfield, Covington, Florence, Independence, Norwood, Forest Park, Erlanger, Fort Thomas, Newport, Sharonville, Blue Ash, Springdale, Reading, Montgomery, Harrison, North College Hill, Madeira and Edgewood. Those in downtown Cincinnati are in the path of these gusty winds and should prepare for hazardous weather conditions. This includes the following Interstates... I-71 in Kentucky between mile markers 66 and 77. I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 0 and 17. I-74 in Ohio between mile markers 2 and 19. I-75 in Kentucky between mile markers 167 and 191. I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 0 and 19. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...35 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
